Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum ReconnectFilter.Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ReconnectFilter.Type>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReconnectFilter.Type
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ReconnectFilter.Type>
    Enclosing interface:
    ReconnectFilter<T extends ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent>
    public static enum ReconnectFilter.Type
extends java.lang.Enum<ReconnectFilter.Type>
    An enum provided through ReconnectFilter.ConnectionLostEvent.type() that describes what reconnect stage we're at.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      LONG_TERM__SHOULD_CONTINUE
      A small period of time has passed since we last asked about LONG_TERM__SHOULD_TRY_AGAIN, so just making sure you want to keep going.
      LONG_TERM__SHOULD_TRY_AGAIN
      An attempt to reconnect in the long term failed, should we try again?.
      SHORT_TERM__SHOULD_CONTINUE
      A small period of time has passed since we last asked about SHORT_TERM__SHOULD_TRY_AGAIN, so just making sure you want to keep going.
      SHORT_TERM__SHOULD_TRY_AGAIN
      An attempt to reconnect in the short term failed, should we try again?.
